accepts.description: image provided WSQ image data encoded as a Base64 string.
ppi specifies the Pixels-per-inch of the capture WSQ image.
opts are additional options to pass to the computation (usually not used).

returns.description: Returns NFIQ score and MLP score.

computeNfiq.description: Compute the NFIQ score of the Base64 encoded WSQ image.

accepts.description: First WSQ fingerprint image encoded as Base64.
Second WSQ fingerprint image encoded as Base64.

returns.description: Resulting verification score from 0-10000 (higher is better).

verify.description: Verifies two WSQ encoded fingerprint images.

accepts.description: WSQ formatted image encoded as Base64.

returns.description: Returns focus quality and preprocessed WSQ formatted image encoded as Base64.

preprocessFingerprint.description: Preprocesses WSQ formatted fingerprint image, and returns result.

accepts.description: WSQ formatted image encoded as Base64.

returns.description: Returns enhanced WSQ formatted image encoded as Base64.

enhanceFingerprint.description: Enhances a WSQ formatted image encoded as Base64.

accepts.description: WSQ formatted image encoded as Base64.

returns.description: Returns a Base64 encoded FingerprintTemplate object.

generateFingerprintTemplate.description: Generates a fingerprint template given a WSQ formatted image encoded as Base64.
